text: Mata (isurāmu no) bōgai to fushinjin (no jochō) no tame ni, ichiza no masujido o konryū shita mono ga ari, sorede shinja no ma o bunretsu sa se, mata saki ni arrā to sono shito ni taishite tatakatta mono no tame no, kakurega to suru mono ga aru. Shikamo (kuchisakide wa),`watashi-tachi wa, tada yoi koto o okonau dakedesu.' To chikaiu. Daga arrā wa, kare-ra ga tashika ni itsuwatte iru koto o risshō sa reru
